betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Welcome to §eAge 0 - The Steam Age§f! While you don't have electricity yet, you can make Steam Machines now, which will help you out alot early.

Hint: You can turn off Machines - both Electric and Steam ones - with an §2Soft Mallet§f, so if your Steam Machine ran out of §2Steam§f, be sure to turn it off and turn it back on as soon as the §2Boiler §fmade more!
